sourceDesc.bibl:
Nāṭyaśāstra of Bharatamuni: With the Commentary Abhinavabhāratī of Abhinavagupta. Chapters 1-7 Illustrated, Vol. 1 Revised and critically edited by Dr. K. Krishnamoorthy, M.A., B.T., Ph.D.
Oriental Institute Vadodara 1992
Gaekwad's Oriental Series 34
General Editor: Ramakrishna T. Vyas

text.body:
śrīrastu |
bharatamunipraṇītaṃ
nāṭyaśāstram |
prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ |
praṇamya śirasā devau pitāmahamaheśvarau |
nāṭyaśāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā yadudāhṛtamyudadīritam || 1 ||
﻿
﻿
﻿
﻿
samāptajapyaṃ vratinaṃ svaśiṣyaiḥsvasutaiḥ parivāritam |
anadhyāye kadācittuttam bharataṃ nāṭyakovidam || 2 ||
munayaḥ paryupāsyainamātreyapramukhāḥ purā |
papracchuste mahātmāno nāṭyavedasamudbhavamniyatendriyabuddhayaḥ || 3 ||
﻿
yo 'yaṃ bhagavatā samyakkathitogracitoggrathito vedasammitaḥvistaraḥsammataḥ |
nāṭyavedaḥ kathaṃ brahmannutpannaḥ kasya vā kṛte || 4 ||
katyaṃśaḥkatyaṅgaḥ kiṃpramāṇaśca prayogaścāsya kīdṛśaḥ |
sarvametadyathātattva bhagavanvaktumarhasi || 5 ||
﻿
﻿
teṣāṃ tu tadvacanamvacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ |
pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ nāṭyavedakathāṃ prati || 6 ||
bhavadbhiḥ śucibhirbhūtvā tathā 'vahitamānasaiḥ |
śrūyatāṃ nāṭyavedasya saṃkṣeposambhavo brahmamuninirmitaḥ || 7 ||
﻿
pūrvaṃpurā kṛtayuge viprā vṛtte svāyambhuve 'ntare |
tretāyuge 'thatraitāyuge tutretāyuge catretāyuge sampravṛtte samprāpte manorvaivasvatasya tuca || 8 ||
grāmyadharmadharmepravṛtte tu lobhamohavaśamkāmalobhavaśaṃ gate |
īrṣyākrodhādibhisaṃmụ̄dhe loke sukhitaduḥkhite || 9 ||
﻿
devadānavagandharvagandharvai rakṣoyakṣayakṣarakṣomahoragaiḥ |
jambūdvīpe samākrānte lokapālapālaiḥpratiṣṭhite || 10 ||
mahendrapramukhairdevairuktaḥ kila pitāmahaḥ |
krīḍanīyakamicchāmo dṛśyaṃ śravyaṃśrāvyam ca yadbhavetyadvibho || 11 ||
﻿
[na vedavyavahāro 'yaṃ saṃśrāvyaḥ śūdrajātiṣu |
tasmātsṛjāparaṃ vedaṃ pañcamaṃ sārvavarṇikam || 12 ||N omits
﻿
evamastviti tānukatvā devarājaṃ visṛjya ca |
sasasmāreda tadā brahmāsasmāra casmāra caturo vedānyogamāsthāya tayogavitttvavit || 13 ||
nemeइदं पद्यं N मपुस्तक एव दृश्यते vedā yataḥ śrāvyāḥ strīśūdrādyāsu jātiṣu |
vedamanyattataḥ srakṣye sarvaśrāvyaṃ tu pañcamam ||
﻿
dharmyamarthyaṃ dharmakāmārthasaṃyuktamyaśasyaṃ ca sosopadeśampadeśayaṃ sasaṅgraham |
bhaviṣyataśca lokasyakālasyaloke 'sya sarvakarmānudarśakamdarśanamkarmapradarśakam || 14 ||
sarvaśāstrārthasampannaṃ sarvaśilpaśīlāśiṣyapravartakamdarśakamsamanvitampraveśakam |
nānāṭyasaṃjñamimaṃ vedamṭyākhyaṃ pañcamaṃ vedaṃ setihāsaṃ karomyaham || 15 ||
﻿
proktvā tu bhagavānevaṃ vedāna sarvānsmṛtvā tu bhagavānevamsaṅkalpya bhagavānevamtataḥ sa bhagavān brahmā vedān sarvānanusmanaranevaṃ saṅkalpya bhagavāt sarvān vedānsarvavedānapitāmahaḥnusmaran |
nāṭyavedaṃ tataścakre caturvedāṅgasambhavamasṛjannāṭyavedaṃ tu sarvavedāṅgasambhavam || 16 ||
jagrāha pāṭhyamṛgvedātsāmabhyosāmato gītameva ca |
yajurvedādabhinayān rasānṛttānānātharvaṇādapi || 17 ||
﻿
dharmakarmārthasaṃyuktaṃ sāpadeśaṃ sasaṃgraham |
rucibhiḥ sarvalokasya sarvakarmānudarśakam ||
sarvaśāstrārthasaṃpannaṃ sarvaśilpasamanvitam |
nāṭyākhyaṃ pañcamaṃ vedamitihāsamacintayat ||Only in N. instead of 12a.
vedopavedasambandhovedopavedaḥvedopavedaiḥ sambaddho nāṭyavedo mahātmanāsampanno brahmaṇā lalitātmakamnāṭyavedo maharṣayaḥ |
evaṃ bhagavatā sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā lalitātmakambrahyaṇā sarvavedinā || 18 ||
N.sarvalokahitārthaṃ tu nāṭyavedo mahātmanā |
utpādya nāṭyavedaṃ tu brahmā 'vocatsureśvaramprāha śakraṃ pitāmahaḥbrahmovāca sureśvaram |
itihāso mayā dṛṣṭaḥsṛṣṭaḥ sa sureṣu niyuniveśyajyatām || 19 ||
﻿
kuśalā ye vidagdhāśca pragalbhāśca jitaklamāḥjitaśramāḥ |
teṣvayaṃ nāṭyasaṃjñonāṭyasaṃjñastunāṭyasaṃjño vai hi vedaḥ saṃkrāmyatāṃ tvayāvedaḥ samyaṅniyujyatām || 20 ||
tacchrutvā vacanaṃbhagavān śakro śakro brahmaṇā yasamudāhṛtamdudāhṛtam |
prāñjaliḥ praṇatovinayātprāñjaliḥ bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham || 21 ||
grahaṇe dhāraṇe jñānecaiva prayoge cāsya sattama |
na śaktā bhagavan devā na yoāyogyā bhagavan devā na śaktā nāṭyakarmaṇiaśaktā bhagavan devā ayogyā nāṭyakarmaṇikarmasu || 22 ||
﻿
ya ime vedaguhyajñā munayaḥṛṣayaḥ brahmavādinaḥbrahmasambhavāḥśaṃsitavratāḥsaṃśritavratāḥsaṃśitavratāḥ |
ete saṅgrahaṇete samyaggrahaṇete hyasyaetasyaete 'sya grahaṇe śaktāḥ prayoge dhāraṇe tathā ||23||
śrutvemamsa śrutvāśakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvāśrutvā tu śakravacanaṃ māmāhāmbujasambhavaḥ |
tvaṃ putraśatasaṃyuktaḥsampannaḥ prayoktā 'sya bhavānagha || 24 ||
ājñāpito viditvā 'haṃ nāṭyavedaṃ pitāmahāt |
nānye 'nye dhāraṇe yogyāḥ prayoge vāpi sattama | ityukto 'sya prayogasya kuru yatnamatandritaḥ || ājñāṃ vibhorviditvāhaṃ nāṭyavedaṃ pitāmahāt | sutānadhyāpayāmāsa prayogārthī tadājñayā ||sutānadhyāpayāmāsa prayogādīnadarśayatsutānadhyāpayāmāsa prayoge vāpi sattamaputrānādhyāpayaṃ yogyānputrānadhyāpayāmāsa prayogaṃ cāpi tattvataḥ || 25 ||
﻿
śāṇḍilyaṃ cāpijīvacaiva vādyamvātsyaṃ ca kohalaṃ dhūrtilamdattilaṃ munimtathā |
jaṭulāyaḍilājaṭilāmbaṣṭakau caiva tāṇḍayādaṇḍatāṇḍumtaṇḍumagnimukhamśikhaṃ tathā || 26 ||
saindhavaṃ puṃsalopulomānaṃ saindhavañcasauvaraṃ casapulomānaṃ śāśvalimvālikampāṭalimbāddhalimśāḍvaliṃ vibudhamvipulaṃ tathā |
yamaṃ dhūmrāyaṇaṃ caiva kapiṃjalamathāpi cakāpiñjalamkapiñjaliṃ bādarimvādirambādiraṃ ca yamadhūmrāyaṇau tathā || 27 ||
jambūbāṣkalamjambūkamjaṅgaṃ cajambudhvajaṃ kokamustaṃ cakākamadrumkākajaṅghaṃ svarṇakṛttāpasausvarṇakaṃ tāpasaṃsvarṇakaṃ tāmasaṃ tathāpūrṇakaṃ tāpasaṃ tathā tathā |
पङ्क्तिद्वयं ta पुस्तके नास्तिkedāramkedarimkaidāriṃ śālikarṇaṃ ca dīrghagātraṃ ca śālikamdīrghasautraṃ ca bādarim || 28 ||
kotsamkautsaṃ tānyāsinamtāṇḍyāpanitāṇḍāyaniṃ caiva piṇḍapiḍgalaṃ chatrakamchatrameva cacitrameva cacitrakaṃ tathā ||
andhukamnujalamballakam | bhālukambhallakambandhulaṃ bāṣkalambālukambhallakaṃ caiva muṣṭhikaṃ saindhavāyanam || 29 ||
﻿
tintilamtaitilaṃ bhārgavaṃ caiva śuciṃ bahulameva ca |
ambudhamabudhaṃ budhasenaṃ ca pārakarṇampāṇḍukarṇimpāṇḍukarṇaṃ sakeralamsatoralamsurekṣalamsamocalamsukeralam || 30 ||
miśrakamṛjuṃ kamaṇḍalumṛjukaṃ maṇḍakaṃ caiva śābaramśāmbakamśambaraṃ vañculamvañjulaṃ tathā |
māgadhaṃ suralamsāraṇam | sukalamsaralaṃ caikacaiva kātaramcaiva kartāraṃ cātrimeva cacogrameva ca || 31 ||
tuṣādamtuṣāraṃ pārbatamparvatampāṃśalampārṣadaṃ caiva gautamaṃ bādarāyaṇimbādarāyaṇam |
udāriṃ varuṇaṃ caiva varaṇiṃ haṃsameva caviśālaṃ śabalaṃ caiva sunābhaṃ meṣameva ca || 32 ||
kāleyamkāliyaṃ bhramaraṃ caiva tathā pīṭhamukhaṃ munim |
tarukuṭṭānakhakuṭṭāśmakuṭṭau ca ṣaṭpadaṃ cottamamsaptamamsottamaṃ tathā || 33 ||
pānahopāpādukaupāpāṇḍūpānahaupādukopānahau caiva saśrutaṃ ṣaṭsvaramśrutiṃ ca svarameva cacābhisuraṃ tathāśrutiṃ cāṣasvaraṃ tathā |
agnikuṇḍājyakuṇḍauaśmakuṇḍau ca ca vitāṇḍyaṃ taṇḍyavitaṇḍyaṃ tāṇḍyameva ca || 34 ||
kekarākṣamkartarākṣaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ nakulaṃ duṣṣahaṃ tathāduṣpahaṃkuśalaṃ dussahaṃ tathā |
jālamjalammaपुस्तके इदमर्धं नास्तिlājaṃ bhayānakaṃ caiva bībhatsaṃ suvicakṣaṇamsavicakṣaṇam || 35 ||
﻿
puṇḍrākṣaṃ pūrṇanāsaṃ caअत्र 'त.' पुस्तकेः - किरीटिनञ्च भाष (N. पाश)ञ्च तथा धन्दिनमेव च । शिलापट्टं स्वर्णगुञ्जं (N.स्वर्णगं च) शिलाशिनमथापि (N.तथा धन्विनमेव ) भाषा च ॥ ३६ ॥ अग्निवेशं शिवञ्चैव ध्यानं जप्यं सुमङ्गलम् । जैशिषव्य (N.जैगीषव्यं) कुण्डिनञ्च तथा कलशमेव च ॥ ३७ ॥ विद्धाक्षं घूर्णनासञ्चाप्यसितं सितमेव च । इत्यधिकं दृश्यते N.omits this line.puṇḍrākṣaṃ puṇḍranāsaṃ asitāsitameva cacāpyasitaṃ sitameva ca |
vidyujjihvaṃ mahājihvaṃ sālākusitaṃśālaṅkāyanameva ca || 36 ||
tyāmāyanamśyāmāyanaṃ māṭharaṃ ca lohitāṅgaṃ tathaiva canikuṭṭakam |
saṃvartakaṃ pañcasakhampañcaśikhaṃ triśikhaṃ śikhimevaśikharameva caśikhameva ca || 37 ||goddaṃ ca pāṭaniṃ caiva lomaśaṃ śyāvakaṃ tathā
(śaṅkhavarṇamukhaṃ khaṇḍamइदं पङक्तिद्वयं ta पुस्तके नास्तिṣaṇḍaṃ śaṅkukarṇamathāpi ca |
śakranemiṃ gabhastiṃ cāpyaṃśumāliṃ śaṭhaṃ tathā || 38 ||)
﻿
vidyutaṃ śātajaṅghaṃ ca raudravīraraudraṃ vīramathāpi ca |
pitāmahājñayā 'smābhirlokasya ca guṇepsayāअयं श्लोकः त पुस्तके नास्ति N also omits this. || 39 ||
evamādi śataṃ pūrṇa samagraṃ bhūmibhāgaśaḥevamādyaṃ putraśataṃ samagraṃ bhūmibhāgaśaḥsāgraṃ bhūmivibhāgaśaḥprayojitaṃ putraśataṃ sāgraṃ bhūmibhāgaśaḥyathābhūmivibhāgaśaḥ |
yasmin karmaṇi yo yogyastasmin sa viniyojitaḥyo yasminkarmaṇi yathā yogyo 'sau tatra yojitaḥyogyastasmin sa yojitaḥ || 40 ||
bhāratīṃ sāttvatīṃ caiva vṛttimārabhaṭīṃ tathā |
samāśritaḥ prayogastu prayukto vai mayā dvijāḥ || 41 ||
parigṛhya praṇamyātha brahmā vijñāpito mayāN. omits this line. |
athāha māṃ suraguruḥ kaiśikīmapi kaiśikīmihayojaya || 42 ||
﻿
yacca tasyāḥ kṣamaṃ dravyaṃ tadbrūhi dvijasattama |
evaṃ tenātenānvasmyabhihitaḥ pratyuktaśca mayā prabhuḥ || 43 ||
kriyatāmdīyatāṃ bhagavandravyaṃ kaiśikyāḥ samprayojakam |
mṛdvaṅganṛtāṅgahārasampannāsaṃyuktā lalitābhinayātmikārasabhāvakriyātmikā || 44 ||
dṛṣṭomayādṛṣṭā mayā bhagavatosa mantavyā nīlavarṇasyanṛtyataḥ śaṅkarasya tunīlakaṇṭhasya nṛtyataḥ |
kaiśikī ślakṣṇanaipathyānaipathya śṛṅgārarasasambhavā || 45 ||
na śakyāaśakyā puruṣaiḥ sādhusā tu prayoktuṃ strījanairvināstrīgatirhi sāstrījanādṛte |
tato 'sṛjanmahātejā manasā 'psaraso vibhuḥ || 46 ||
﻿
nāṭyālaṅkāracaturāḥkuśalāḥ॰kāriṇyaḥ prādānmahyaṃ prayogataḥkṣaṇātsuravarastadāprayogajño gurustadā |
N kṣa ma taइदमर्धं 'मागधीमर्जुनीम्' इत्यतः परं दृश्यतेmañjukeśīṃ sukeśīṃ ca miśrakeśīṃ sulocanāmpādacūlāṃ tathaiva ca || 47 ||
saudāmanīmsaudāminīṃ devadattāṃ devasenāṃ manoramāmtathaiva camanovatīm |
surabhimsudatīṃ sundarīṃ caiva vidagdhāṃ vibudhāmvividhāmvipulāṃ tathā || 48 ||
﻿
sumanāmsumālāṃ lāsinīmsantatiṃ caiva sunandāṃ sumukhīṃ ratimइदमर्धं N ta पुस्तके नास्तिtathā |
māgadhīmarjunīṃ caiva saralāṃ keralāṃ dhṛtimsatīmkekarāṃ tathākekaṭīṃ tathā || 49 ||
nandāṃ sapuṣkalāṃ ca puṣkalāṃcaiva kalamāṃkalabhāñcaiva nirmamekapilāṃ sumanāṃ tathā caiva me dadau |sunandāṃ sumukhīñcaiva kāhalyādyāśca me dadau | ityardhamadhikaṃ dṛśyate
svātirbhāṇḍaniyuktastu saha śiṣyaiḥ svayambhuvāsārdhaṃ śiṣyagaṇaistathā || 50 ||
nāradādyāśca gandharvā gānayogenāṭyayoge niyojitāḥ |
evaṃbhāvanāṭya nāṭyamidaṃ samyagbuddhvābuddhvā samyakchiṣyagaṇaiḥ sahavedhā lokavedasamarthitam sarvaiḥ sutaiḥ saha || 51 ||
svātināradasaṃyukto vedavedāṅgakāraṇamnāradaḥ svātisahitaḥ suragandharvavāritaḥ |
upasthito 'haṃ lokeśam | prayogārthībrahmāṇaṃ prayogārthaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ || 52 ||
nāṭyasyavedasya grahaṇaṃ prāptaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇyaham |
etattu vacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ || 53 ||
﻿
mahānayaṃahokālaḥ prayogaśca sa mayā samupaprayogasya samayaḥ samupaprayogasya śrīmān yugayogataḥpratyupasthitaḥ |
ayaṃ dhvajamahaḥ śrīmān śacībhartuḥmahendrasya pravartate || 54 ||
putreatredānīmayaṃ vedo nāṭyasaṃjñaḥ prayojyaprayujyatām |
tataśśakradhvatatastasmindhvajamahe nihatāsuradānave || 55 ||
prahṛṣṭāmarasaṃkīrṇe mahendravijayotsave |
nāndī kṛtā mayā pūrvamāśīrvacanapūrvaṃ kṛtvāpūrvaṃ kṛtā mayā nāndī hyāśīrvacanasaṃyutā || 56 ||
﻿
aṣṭāṅgapadasaṃyuktā vicitrā devasammatādevasaṃmitāvedasaṃmitādevanirmitādevatāstutisammatādevatāstutisaṃśrayāvedanirmitā |
kṛtā tadante 'nukṛtiḥtadante tu kṛtirbuddhātadante 'nukṛtirbaddhā yathā daityāḥ surairjitāḥ || 57 ||
sampheṭavidravakṛtā cchedyakhedāharātmikābhedyāvahāvedāhavābhedyāravātmikābhedyāhavātmikā |
tato brahmādayo devāḥ prayogaparitoṣitāḥ || 58 ||
pradadurhṛṣṭamanasaḥprayayuḥ pradadurhaṣṭāpradadurmatsutebhyastu sarvopakaraṇāni naḥvai |
prītastu prathamaṃ śakro dattavānsvaṃdhvajamuttamam dhvajaṃ śubham || 59 ||
﻿
brahmā kamaṇḍalumkuṭilakaṃ caiva bhṛṅgāraṃ varuṇaḥ śubhamtathā |
sūryaśśastramsūryaśchatraṃ śivo jñānamśivā siddhimśivassiddhiṃ vāyurvyajanameva casomaḥ śrī dyaurvatām || 60 ||
viṣṇuḥ siṃhāsanaṃ caiva kubero makuṭaṃ tathā |
etayoridamardha paṭhyateśrāvyatvaṃ prekṣaṇīyasya śravyatvaṃ krīḍanīyasyadadau devī sarasvatī || 61 ||
śeṣā ye devagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ |
tasminsadasyatiprītāsi tiṣṭhantisyabhipretānnānājātiguṇāśrayānśrayāḥ || 62 ||
aṃśāṃśairbhāṣitaṃrbhāṣitān bhāvān rasān rūpaṃ balaṃbaliṃ kriyāmbhāvān rūpamaṅgaṃ kriyāṃ balamkriyābalambalaṃ kriyām tathā |
pradadurmatsutebhyastu citraṃ cābharaṇaṃ bahucitramābharaṇaṃ bahudattavantaḥ prahṛṣṭāste matsutebhyo divaukasaḥ || 63 ||N. has instead: स्वांशांशैर्भाषितं भावाद्रूपमङ्गं क्रियाबलम् । प्रददुर्मत्सुतेभ्यस्तु चित्र चाभरणं बहु
﻿
evaṃ prayoge prārabdhe daityamānavivāśanedaityadānavanāśaneśāśanedaityādīnāṃ vināśanam |
athāsurāśca kṣumitā ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥvighnānutpādayan dhruvamathāsurāścābhitoṣyāḥabhavankṣubhitāḥ sarve daityā ye tatra darpitāḥsaṅgatāḥ || 64 ||
virūpākṣapurogāstupurogāścapurogāṃśca vighnānpronatsāhya ta 'bruvanvighnānutsāhayanti tetsāhya te 'bruvan |
na netthamīkṣāmahenetthamicchāmahekṣamiṣyāmahe nāṭyametadāgamyatāmiti || 65 ||
tatastairasuraiḥ sārdhaṃ vighnā māyāmupāśritāḥ |
vācaśceṣṭāṃ smṛtiṃ caiva stambhayanti sma nṛtyatām || 66 ||
evamtathā vidhvaṃsanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatasteṣāṃ sasūtradhārasya devarāṭ |
kasmātprayogavaiṣamyamityuktvā dhyānamāviśat || 67 ||
﻿
athāpaśyatsadotadā vighnaiḥ samantātparivāritam |
sahānugaiḥtadetaraiḥtathaitaraiḥsahetaraṃ sūtradhāraṃ naṣṭasaṃjñaṃ jalīkṛtamsahetaraiḥ sūtradhāraṃ naṣṭasaṃjñaṃ jaḍīkṛtam || 68 ||
athotthāya drutaṃ krodhād divyaṃ jagrāha taṃ dhvajamutthāya tvaritaṃ śakraḥ krodhājjagrāhadhvajamdivyaṃ jagrāha sa dhvajamgṛhītvā dhvajamuttamam |
sarvaratnojjvalajvalaṃ taṃ tujjvalatanumtanuḥ kiñcidudvṛttakopādudvṛttaśakraḥ prodvṛttalocanaḥlocanaḥ || 69 ||
raṅgapīṭhagatānvighnānasurāṃścaiva devarāṭ |
jarjarīkṛtadehāṃstānakarojjarjareṇa saḥ || 70 ||
nihateṣu ca sarveṣu vighneṣuhaiteṣu teṣu vighneṣu sarveṣugateṣu teṣu vighneṣu sarveṣu saha dānavaiḥ |
praṇamya tattvattoṃ vākyamidamūcuḥpraṇamyainaṃ tadā vākyamidamūcuḥsamprahasyasamprasahyasamprahṛṣya tato vākyamāhuḥ sarve divaukasaḥ || 71 ||
aho praharaṇaṃ divyamidamāsāditaṃ tvayā |
nāṭyavidhvaṃsinaḥ sarve yenaite jarjarīkṛtāḥjarjarīkṛtadehāstu dānavā yena te kṛtāḥjarjarīkṛtasarvāṅgā yenaine dānavāḥ kṛtāḥ || 72 ||
yasmādanena te vighnā sāsurā jarjarīkṛtāḥ |
tasmājjarjara ityeṣaeveti khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyatināmato 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati || 73 ||
śeṣā ye caiva vighnārthamhiṃsārthamupasthāsyanti vighnakāḥvighnatāmmupayāsyānti hiṃsakāḥvighnakāḥ |
dṛṣṭavemamdṛṣṭavainamduṣṭavaiva jarjaraṃ te 'pi gamiṣyantyevameva tu || 74 ||
evaṃ bhaviṣyatītyetevaṃ bhaviṣyatītyevaevamevāstviti tataḥ śakraḥ provāca tānsurān |
rakṣābhūtaḥ sadaivāsyarakṣābhūtaḥ sa daivasyarakṣābhūtaśca sarveṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣabhaviṣyatyeva jarjaraḥ || 75 ||
﻿
prayoge prastute hyevaṃpunaḥ prayoge prārabdhe sphīte śakramahe punaḥtadāpurāidamardhaṃ nāsti |
bhūyaḥ santrāsayanti smatrāsaṃ sañjanayanti sma vighnāḥ niścitamānasāḥmadvadhabuddhayaḥśeṣāstu nṛtyatām || 76 ||
dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ vyavasitaṃ madarthetastadarthedaityānāṃ vighnakārakamviprakārajam |
upasthito 'haṃ brahmāṇaṃ suraiḥsutaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ || 77 ||
niḥsṛtāniścitā bhagavanvighnā nāṭyasyāsya vināśane |
atoasya rakṣāvidhiṃ samyagājñāpaya pitāmahasureśvara || 78 ||
tataḥ satatastu tataśca viśvakarmāṇaṃ āha brahmābrahmāvocatbrahmovāca prayatnataḥ |
kuru lakṣaṇasampannaṃ nāṭyaveśma mahāmatemahāmune || 79 ||
tato 'cireṇa kālena viśvakarmā mahacchubham |
sarvalakṣaṇasampannaṃ nāṭyaveśma cakāra saḥkṛtvā nāṭyagṛhaṃ tu saḥ || 80 ||
kṛtvā yathoktamevaṃ tu gṛhaṃ padmodbhavājñayā | ityadhikaṃ dṛśyate |tato 'bravīdviśvakarmā brahmāṇaṃ prayatāñjaliḥproktavāndruhiṇaṃ gatvā sabhāyāntu kṛtāñjaliḥ |
sajjaṃ nāṭyagṛhaṃ deva tadavekṣitumarhasi || 81 ||
tataḥ sahasārdha mahendreṇa suraiḥ sarvaiśca sattamaiḥsamanvitaḥsarveḥ sahetaraiḥsetaraiḥ |
agacchatāgatastvaritā draṣṭuṃ druhiṇo nāṭyamaṇḍapam || 82 ||
﻿
dṛṣṭvā nāṭyagṛhaṃ brahmā prāha sarvānsurāṃstataḥtadā |
aṃśabhāgairbhavadbhistu rakṣyo 'yaṃ nāṭyamaṇḍapaḥ || 83 ||
rakṣaṇe maṇḍapasyāsyamaṇḍapasyātha niyukto rajanīkaraḥviniyuktastu candramāḥ |
yathādiśaṃ lokapālāḥyathādiglokapālaścalokapālāstathā dikṣu vidikṣvapi ca mārutāḥ || 84 ||
nepathyabhūmau mitrastu nikṣipto varuṇo 'mbare |
vedikāyāṃ pārthivāgniḥvedikāṃ pāvakaḥ pātuvedikārakṣaṇe vahnibhāṇḍe viśvadivokasaḥbhāṇḍaṃ sarve divaukasaḥrbhāṇḍe sarvadivaukasaḥ || 85 ||
varṇāścatvāra evātraevāsyatathā stambheṣu yojitāḥevātha stambheṣu viniyojitāḥ |
ādityāścaiva rudrāśca nyastāḥgatāḥkṛtāḥsthitāḥ stambhāntareṣvatha || 86 ||
bhūtāni śālāsvapsarasastathā sarveṣu veśmasudhāraṇīṣu sthitā bhūtā śālā -----tathāṅgirādhāraṇīṣvatha bhūtāni śālāsvapsarasastathā |
mahodadhirmahīpṛṣṭhe yakṣiṇyaḥ sarvaparvasusarvaveśmasu yakṣiṇyo mahīpṛṣṭhe mahodadhiḥ || 87 ||
﻿
dvāraśālāniyuktau tu kṛtāntaḥ kāla eva ca |
sthāpitau dvāradvārapatre tupārśvepatreṣu nāgarājaunāgamukhyau mahābalau || 88 ||
dehalyāṃ yamadaṇḍaṇḍaścastu śūlaṃ copari saṃsthitamtasyopari sthitam |
dvārapālau sthitau cobhau nirṛtiniyatirmṛtyureva ca || 89 ||
pārśve ca raṅgapīṭhasyaraṅgapīṭhasya pārśve tu mahendraḥ sthitavānsvayamsvayaṃ śakraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
sthāpitā mattavāraṇyāṃ vidyuddaityaniṣūdanī || 90 ||
stambheṣu mattavāraṇyāḥ sthāpitāḥ parirakṣaṇeparipālane |
bhūtā yakṣāḥbhūtayakṣapiśācāśca guhyakāśca mahābalāḥ || 91 ||
jarjare cāpi nikṣiptāṃcaiva nikṣiptamtu vinikṣiptaṃ vajraṃ daityanibarhaṇam |
sandhau sandhautatparvasu ca nitatparvasu vinikṣiptāḥ surendrā hyamitaujasaḥ || 92 ||
﻿
śiro rakṣan sthito brahmā haraḥ parvaṇyanantareśiraḥ pārśveśiraḥparvasthito brahmā dvitīye śaṅkarastathā |
tṛtīye bhagavānca sthito viṣṇuścaturthe skanda eva ca || 93 ||
pañcame ca mahānāgāḥ śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ |
evaṃ vighnavināśāya sthāpitā jarjare surāḥreśvarāḥ || 94 ||
raṅgapīṭhasya madhye tu svayaṃ brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
ijyārthamiṣṭyartha raṅgamadhye tu kriyate puṣpamokṣaṇam || 95 ||
pātālavāsino ye ca yakṣaguhyakapannagāḥ |
adhastādraṅgapīṭhasya rakṣaṇe terakṣaṇāyaviniyojitāḥ niyojitāḥ || 96 ||
nāyakaṃ rakṣatīndrastu nāyakaṃ pātināyikāṃ catu sarasvatī |
vidūṣakamathauṅkāraḥ śeṣāstu prakṛtīrharaḥhariḥityartham ||97||
yānyetāni niyuktāni daivatānīha rakṣaṇe |
eteṣāmadhidevāstuetānyevādhidaivāni bhaviṣyantītyuvāca saḥ || 98 ||
etasminnantare devaiḥ sarvairuktaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
sāmnā tāvadime vighnāḥ sthāpyantāṃ vacasā tvayā || 99 ||
pūrvaṃ sāma prayoktavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ dānameva ca |
tayorupari bhedastu tato daṇḍaḥ praśasyateprayujyate || 100 ||
devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā vighnānuvāca ha |
kathamkasmādbhavanto nāṭyasya vināśārthamupasthitāḥvināśāya samutthitāḥsamutthāpitā || 101 ||
brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvātatśrutvā brahmaṇau vākyaṃ virūpākṣo 'bravīdvacaḥdidam |
daityairvighnagaṇaiḥ sārdha sāmapūrvamidaṃ tataḥvacaḥ || 102 ||
yo 'yaṃ bhagavatāsamyak sṛṣṭo nāṭyavedaḥ surecchayāpravartitaḥprakīrtitaḥ |
pratyādeśo 'yamasmākaṃ devārthesurārtha bhavatā kṛtaḥ || 103 ||
﻿
﻿
tannaitadevaṃ kartavyaṃ tvayā lokapitāmaha |
yathā devāstathā daityāstvattaḥ sarve vinirgatāḥ || 104 ||
virūpākṣavacaḥvighnānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā vacanamabravīt |
alaṃ vo manyunā daityā viṣādastyajyatāmayamviṣādaṃ tyajatānaghāḥ || 105 ||
bhavatāṃ devatānāṃ ca śubhāśubhavikalpanamvikalpakevikalpakaḥ |
karmabhāvānvayāpekṣīyāpekṣo nāṭyavedo mayā kṛtaḥ || 106 ||
naikāntato 'tra bhavatāṃ devānāṃ cāpicātravānucānubhāvanam |
trailokyasyāsya sarvasya nāṭyaṃ bhāvānukīrtanam || 107 ||
﻿
﻿
kvaciddharmaḥ kvacitkrīḍā kvacidarthaḥ kvacicchamaḥcchramaḥ |
kvaciddhāsyaṃ kvacidyuddhaṃ kvacitkāmaḥ kvacidvadhaḥ || 108 ||
dharmo dharmapravṛttānāṃdharmo 'dharma kāmaḥ kāmopasevinām |
nigraho durvinītānāṃ mattānāṃ damanakriyāvinītānāṃ damakriyā || 109 ||
klībānāṃ dhāṣṭryakaraṇamjananamutsāhaḥ śūramāninām |
abudhānāṃ vibodhaśca vaiduṣyaṃvaidagdhyam viduṣāmapi || 110 ||
﻿
﻿
īśvarāṇāṃ vilāsaśca dhairyamsthairyaṃ duḥkhārditasya ca |
arthopajīvināmartho vṛttidhṛtirudvignacetasām || 111 ||
duḥkhitānāṃ pramattāṃśaḥ śokārtānāṃ tapasvinām | hitopadeśajananaṃ nānāvasthāntarātmakam | nānāśīlāḥ prakṛtayaḥ śīlānnāṭyaṃ vinirmitam | tasmāllokapramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ nāṭyavaktṛbhiḥ | devatānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca rājñāmatha kuṭumbinām | kṛtānukaraṇaṃ loke nāṭyamityabhidhīyate | mahecchā ye vidagdhāśca yauvanaiśvaryaśālinaḥ | teṣāmayaṃ nāṭyavidhiḥ prayojyastvarthasiddhaye | prāyeṇa sarvalokasya nṛttamiṣṭaṃ svabhāvataḥ | maṅgalyamiti kṛtvā ca nāṭyametatprayojyate | prasavālāpavivāhaharṣeṣvabhyudayeṣu ca | prasthānasamaye rājñāṃ nāṭyametatprayojyate | ityadhikaṃ dṛśyate |nānābhāvopasampannaṃ nānāvasthāntarātmakam |
lokavṛttānukaraṇaṃ nāṭyametanmayā kṛtam || 112 ||
adhamottamauttamādhamamadhyānāṃ narāṇāṃ karmasaṃśrayam |
hitopadeśajananaṃ dhṛtikrīḍāsukhādikṛtnāṭyametadbhaviṣyati || 113 ||
ma ta अयं श्लोकोऽधिको दृश्यतेsarvārthe sarvadā caivaetadraseṣu bhāveṣu sarvakarmakriyāsvathakriyāsu ca |
sarvopadeśajananaṃ nāṭyamevadbhaviṣyatināṭyaṃ loke bhaviṣyati ||
duḥkhārtānāṃ samarthānāmśramārtānāṃ śokārtānāṃ tapasvinām |
viśrāmajananamviśrāntijananaṃ lokekāle nāṭyametadbhaviṣyatinmayā kṛtam || 114 ||
﻿
dharmyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ hitaṃ buddhivivardhanam |
lokopadeśajananaṃ nāṭyametadbhaviṣyatisarvaśāstrāṇi śilpāni karmāṇi vividhāni ca | yasmānnāṭye sametāni tasmādetanmayā kṛtam || ityadhikam || 115 ||
tacchutamna tajjñānaṃ na tacchilpaṃ na sā vidyā na sā kalā |
na tatkarma na vā yogona yogo 'saunāsau yogo na tatkarma yannāṭye 'sminna dṛśyatenāṭye 'smin yanna dṛśyate || 116 ||
